name: Max
desc: A young mage who wishes to learn more about the world.
fields: Average isn't good enough for me.

name: Max
desc: A keen mage who wishes to aid his friends. Seeks to become more knowledgeable about the world.
fields: Everyone, do your best for me...
Haha! I have really outdone myself today!
I can do anything I set my mind to!
Ah, I'll try harder next time.
Is this a joke? I'm not laughing...
I have really pushed my talents to the MAX!
A different skillset to master? How fun!

name: Max
desc: A keen mage who wishes to aid his friends. Seeks to become more knowledgeable about the world.

name: Xeconis
desc: A soldier in training, whose shrewd demeanour keeps him safe.
fields: Very good, I've opened more avenues.
No tricks here, hard work pays off.

name: Xeconis
desc: A freshly trained soldier simultaneously tutored in battlefield tactics. Has a sharp tongue.
fields: My gambit's been foiled... and thus.. I fold...
Let's go, time is against us. Don't fall behind schedule.
I've devised an interesting maneuver, want to see?
It's more fun when you beat the odds.
A comfortable hand to be dealt.
Perchance, there are no more ploys to learn.
Shuffling my hand may prove strategic...
Investing in me? I'll show you returns.

name: Xeconis
desc: A freshly trained soldier simultaneously tutored in battlefield tactics. Has a sharp tongue.

name: Cherry
desc: A young noblewoman who wants to overcome her shyness.

name: Cherry
desc:
A once shy noble, now a sharp-tongued and opulent braggart.
Cares more than she lets on.
fields: How is this even possible? M-me...
Hohoho! What else did you expect?
Let's not talk about this, okay?
What? Did something happen? Nope, I don't think so.
It's hard to improve on perfection!
No matter my role, I'll always be the greatest!
Frankly, I deserve all the attention.

name: Eff
desc: A bookworm who uses his wyvern to survey the world.
fields: Hmph, I'm not proud of this.

name: Eff
desc: A Monsdorian prince who would rather read than govern.
fields: And so this chapter... Comes to a close...
A new opening for me? I'll take it in stride!
I suppose I am too strong now.
This is proof of my talents.

name: Skill
desc: An aspiring soldier who wants to be a big shot.
fields: I'll do better, just you wait!

name: Skill
desc: A loyal knight of the Aurelian royals.
fields: Not always a fan of change... but I'll see what I can do.
Uhm, alright? I'll get back to it.

name: Skill
desc: A loyal knight of the Aurelian royals.

name: Sages
desc:
Son of Arcein King Sages the 14th. 
A free spirit who cares not for noble discourse.
fields: Great results for the Prince of Arcei!
This is fine, I'm on the up!
Father would tell me to try harder...
My good fellows, we shall depart!
I'm good enough to rule Arcei...
I'll step up to the mantle... Trust in me!

name: Sal
desc: An Aurelian general's daughter who is fascinated by dark magic.

name: Sal
desc: A general in Sages army, with a complicated past.
fields: My enemies will never wake up again!
Night-night foes, I'm even stronger now!
Steady, we'll get there in the end.
I must have nodded off there...
I'll do what I must to prove my loyalty.

name: Aerial
desc: A lax fighter who doesn't sweat the small stuff.
fields: Man... If only I could'a done more...{br}Oh well...
Woo! Now this is how I roll!
Woah, this is more than I could ask for!
Some decent gains to use for my buddies.
Where else can I make some gains?
Guess I better change my training, huh?
This'll be good for my muscles? Yeah!

name: Landros
desc: A young nobleman who has an affinity for the weather.
fields: Uh, I'll wait up ahead for you.
Haha! I've created the perfect storm!
The sun is shining on me today!
I think that one hit the mark.
I can surely do better, no more games.
My mind must be caught in a fog...
Hm, where can my talents drift next?
The winds of change... how interesting.
You're giving this to me? Alright.

name: Smoke
desc: A mischievous thief with a penchance for punnery.
fields: Looks like not even I can evade death...
The audience is dying to see more!
I'll be sure to gain some more fans now!
Guess the smoke's hit the ceiling?
I won't let them know my next move...
Didn't have to steal that either...

name: Roag
desc: A flamboyant and energetic cavalier serving under Sal.
fields: Word on the street is I ate.
Oh my god, girl! Queen shit!

name: Maro
desc: A new soldier who is a stickler for weapon maintenance.
fields: I've refined myself into a better soldier!
We all have to meet standards.
I must strive to do better...
I'll have to teach the others a thing or two!
I'll have to maintain my new equipment, at once!

name: Pikno
desc: A mysterious knight, loyal to Sages. Nobody has seen their face.
fields: So this is how it feels... to be on the other end...
All the more power to help my allies.
A knight's duty is to grow.
I must ponder how to develop further.
I hope this doesn't bring any unwanted attention...
Don't expect me to take off the helmet...

name: Nako
desc: A caring servant to the Sages family.
fields: I'm going to miss... you all...
Please keep safe! I'll be just up ahead!
I'll keep my friends safe, by any means.
I'll continue to keep everyone from harm.
Wow! Look at how far I've come!
I must devote myself to the cause, by any means.

name: Pykroe
desc: A mercenary leader who adheres to their belief in luck and fate.
fields: But... I was supposed to be lucky...?
Nyaha! Luck is beneath my wings today!
Ack! No! Who cursed me?! I will find you.
How can my luck go further?
Fear me foes! I will vanquish thee!

name: Guy
desc: A laid back and apathetic cavalier in Pykroe's mercenaries.
fields: Wait, how did I do that?
Why can't I do anything right?
Huh, even I can make strides sometimes.
I didn't realise I grew so fast...
You gave this to me? Why?

name: Hyper
desc: A hothead swordfighter in Pykroe's mercenaries.
fields: You... YOU! Argh...|I can't feel my legs...
Hah! You'd better watch out foes!
I've got this in the bag!
My blade is like lightning! Hyah!
Huh? This is just okay... Hmph.
No fair! My blade is dull! GAH!
I am too good at this!
My heart burns for combat! No matter the style!

name: Blazing
desc: Son of a Grahment Count. His faith is a source of strength.
fields: My burning beliefs... Scattered like ash...
I made it out alive, thank you Goddess.
This is the result of my convictions!
I must have been blessed, thank you...
Good, but my devotion calls for more.
I can outshine anyone! Except the Goddess of course.
My devotion to the Goddess remains, no matter my attire.

name: Frost
desc: A cleric far from her home in the isolated forest country of Arborst.
fields: I will become one... with the earth...|Just as I... foresaw...
It seems I have bloomed a new power!
I can grow, bit by bit.
I will cherish this blossoming power.
I foresaw a change in my future, this must be it.

name: Javi
desc: A loyal knight of Arcei, close guard of King Sages.
fields: Wish I could see more of what the world has to offer...
Seems I've learned something new! How thrilling!
I can do better than this, for Sages!
Woah! I've reached a new plateau!
I trust your judgement, no worries!

name: Javi
desc: A loyal knight of Arcei

name: Boey
desc: A former gang leader who seems to not quite know what he's doing.
fields: You only killed me... because you're obsessed...
Ahuh! Yeah! Another hit by Boey!
C'mon, you wish you were me.
This is personal! Who did this?
Of course you'd wanna give me extra attention.
No matter the job, I'm the best man, really!

name: Angel
desc: A snarky mage who joined Boey's gang.
fields: Alright... I didn't ask for this, but sure...

name: Apple
desc: A member of Boey's gang. Good at helping clean up messes.
fields: At least I'm better dressed than you...
I love the new getup, does it suit me?

name: Tobi
desc: A master thief who is known as the 'Blue Burglar'.

name: Cacti
desc: A prickly mage who yearns for adventure.
fields: In the end, I was so foolish...
Made it, another day for adventures!
I'm glad it all worked out. I'm itching to use this power!
Hah! This is how I work!
I'm pleased with this, I'd say.
What happened?! I cannot believe this!
I hope I can make use of this new skillset.

name: Faerie
desc: A wyvern rider of the highlands. Has great power.

name: Mipha
desc: A travelling bard, with unknown motives.

name: CJ
desc: A master bowsman, who enjoys the thrill of a hunt.

name: Snow
desc: Apothecary to King Sages and teacher to Nako.

name: Leap
desc: A caring, yet quirky, healer. Has a passion for fashion and has a wandering imagination.
fields: Oh nice, I'm ready to throw down!
Oh wow, look at me go!
I can do better, just you wait!
Oh! Crazy how much I've grown!

name: Prof
desc: A teacher and son of a mayor in a Grahment town.
fields: Diversity of knowledge is the greatest asset one can have. Hell yeah.
Ha! I'd be proud of me if I were me! Wait...
Ouch... I'll just crawl into a hole...
Where else could I apply myself...?
I suppose even a teacher must learn new skills.
That's very kind of you, I would have given it to someone else.

name: Liz
desc: An avid reader who vents her frustrations with the sword.
fields: This wasn't... how it was supposed to end...
The start of a new chapter! I'm a bit nervous...
I'll pen this as a huge success!
I think this is alright... right?
Hm, not sure if I like this...
This is a bit much for me... but I'll try.

name: Mizt
desc: A priest disillusioned with his faith.
fields: Uh, tell me where to go from here.
Even I can do great things.
This may as well be the end for me...
Whatever guided me here, I thank you.

name: Aspl
desc:
A cavalier in training.
Has delusions of grandeur.
fields: This was your fault. Be ashamed.
This'd be too easy if I stayed, so I'm gonna go.
Guess I didn't get lucky this time
I've reached the pinnacle of luck.
I'm cooler than anyone else here.
I'll be the best at this too, don't worry.
You're smart. Give me all the stat boosters, now.

name: Bread
desc:
A cavalier in training.
Loves all things cute.
fields: No! Where are you all going... my friends?
My friends helped me so much!
Aw, can't I have a do-over?
Oh! These new clothes are so cute!

name: Shoop
desc: An eccentric mage who has a penchance for tomfoolery.
fields: I'm setting an ambush for you ahead, hehe...
I'm feeling so goofy right now.
I can contour this to look better...
Gyahaha! I'm gonna kill ya! Kidding! Or am I?
I'd rather have a pet reptile, but this is fine too.

name: Cade
desc: A travelling minstrel who adores an audience.
fields: I'm setting an ambush for you ahead, hehe...
I'm feeling so goofy right now.
I can contour this to look better...
Gyahaha! I'm gonna kill ya! Kidding! Or am I?

name: Siri
desc: A wyvern riding wanderer who has a weird fascination with monsters.
fields: I'm leaving, don't keep me waiting!
I'll be able to take more on now!
More beasts for me to tame? Good, good...
This is my reward? Thanks a lot!

name: Nabin
desc:
Son of Duke Hogarth von Ilkrest.
Disagrees with his fathers worldviews.
fields: The only certainty in life... is death...
I'm glad I can still learn new things.
Steady progress, what more can you ask for?
What would father say about this...
Change is a part of the process, I welcome it with open arms!

name: Chess
desc:
A calm knight enlisted in Aurelia's army.
His goals are unknown.
fields: This is true peace and quiet...
I've achieved great things here, thank you.
I'm impressed. I'll try it again.
Suppose I could do better, next time.
I must focus on my breathing...

name: Joker
desc: An anti-social bruiser who Ahmari trusts to get a job done.
fields: I'm just... gonna die over here... yup...
New power to defeat new foes. Hawhawhaw!
This is gonna help me cave some skulls in.
Alright, who do I bash next?

name: Skarm
desc: Assassin who likes birds.

name: Maxime
desc:
A former teacher, turned thief. 
Mourns his ex.
fields: Even I can learn new tricks.
I'll file this as a success, I guess.
Do I get an A for effort, at least?
I'll give myself a pat on the back later.
I'll raise my hat to that... later.

name: Cres
desc: Marquess of Nekoma, who is a staunch ally of Sages.

name: Pit
desc: An Aurelian cavalier with great potential.
fields: Err... Right! I'll be waiting for you!
Excuse me, but this goes so hard!
I never thought I could be this strong...

name: Pit
desc: An Aurelian cavalier with great potential.

name: Shini
desc: A mercenary who raises money for the church orphanage.

name: Dark
desc: A mage in training who has a tendency to take risks.
fields: I'll be the best there is!
Hahaha! I'm smarter than teach now!
Aw yeah, this is more like it!
Why am I no good at anything?
I'm king of the world! Go me!

name: Lumii
fields: I'm stronger, I won't let anyone harm me or my friends...
Is this Mama watching over me?
I'll use this to protect everyone!
I could do better, next time...

name: Howai
desc: An orphaned boy who likes to paint.
fields: Yay! This is a lovely scene!
I'll make a self portrait to celebrate!
Oh no... I let everyone down...
Anywhere else left to grow? Hm...

name: Demonic
desc: An old, yet not so wise knight of Aurelia.
fields: At my age, this is good.
I'll take what I can get, youngster.

name: Blu
desc: A mischevious bandit who slips away with ease.
fields: Cheers! This is more like it!

name: Zee
desc: A proud knight who is worried about defending himself.

name: Edgy
desc: Cherry's retainer, believes he is the edgiest around.

name: Speedy
desc:
A mysterious thief, donning a shady mask.
Is proud of his quick reflexes.

name: Jevil
desc: King of Palushin. He has an eye of the finer things in life.

name: Vic
desc:
A downtrodden sailor who lost his ship.
Resorted to being a pitfighter.

name: Sages
desc:
The 14th King of Arcei.
Dying of an unknown illness.

name: Naz
desc: Lord

name: Pierre
desc: A suspicious knight taking orders, but from who?

name: Grinst
desc: A bandit who eats far too much of his gang's rations.

name: Lentz
desc: A Monsdorian deserter who has started a bandit group.

name: Sanjay
desc: A town guard keen on killing disruptors.

name: Barnabus
desc: A Monsdorian knight defending the Grahment border.

name: Byron
desc: A commander of Monsdor, leading a hunt for Sages.

name: Septimus
desc: A mysterious shaman, aiding Monsdor.

name: Maurice
desc: A highwayman whose greed is insurmountable.

name: Humphrey
desc: A Monsdor general wishing to seize the town.

name: Zashar
desc: A mysterious man ordering monsters.

name: Zashar
desc: Zashar, transformed into a monsterous giant.

name: Pete
desc: A pirate raiding the port town of Artemi.

name: Brug
desc: A pirate trying to seek revenge for Pete.

name: Kesley
desc: An Aurelian knight ordered by Esteban.

name: Vance
desc:
A Monsdorian priest and tactician.
Overconfident in his tactical advice.

name: Isaac
desc: A traitorous clergyman, who allied with bandits.

name: Jason
desc: A charismatic bandit who escaped from Monsdor Keep.

name: Nancy
desc: One of Palushin's most devoted generals.

name: Hesphatales
desc: A mysterious druid who is seeking for something in Arcei

name: Xanthor
desc: A mysterious druid allied with the Palushin invaders.

name: Viridia
desc: Pit's twin sister, a bubbly overachiever with an unflinching resolve.

name: Xena
desc: The eldest of three sisters, leads Grahment's Phoenix platoon.

name: Mira
desc: The middle of three sisters in Grahment's Phoenix platoon.

name: Carina
desc: The youngest of three sisters in Grahment's Phoenix platoon.

name: Sunii
desc: A mysterious woman running from bandits.

name: Sunii2
desc: A mysterious woman running from bandits.

name: Talia
desc: From the icy village of Glaceil, taught Xeconis how to use the lance.

name: Emeline
desc: Queen of Aurelia, seeks retribution for her brother's death.
fields: I must thank the Goddess for this.
A Queen should do better than this...
I should never have taken the crown...

name: Morshu
desc: A merchant who travels the continent.

name: Count Varley
desc: Punching bag.

name: Cedric
desc:
A wicked knight in service of Archbishop Cornelius.
Leap's father.

name: Eleonora
desc: Leap's mother, a kindhearted yet airheaded cleric.

name: Melinda
desc:
A noblewoman who despises her fleeting youth.
Shoop's mother.

name: Lucian
desc: Uncle of Queen Emeline, a conniving and spiteful man.

name: Helia
desc: Emeline's cousin, dutiful and caring, but diffident.

name: Dawn
desc: Emeline's cousin, youthful and full of energy.

name: Argento
desc: Steward of the Aurelian royal family.

name: Oberon
desc: King of Monsdor, 'Rule by strength' is his motto.

name: Emmanuel
desc: The 2nd sibling of the Monsdor royals. Arrogant and rude.

name: Esteban
desc: An Aurelian knight with high composure.

name: Hogarth
desc: Duke von Ilkrest, prioritises his own ideas over all others.

name: Dean
desc: Prof's dad, and mayor of a town in Grahment.

name: Timothy
desc:
Earl Mandrock of Grahment. 
Greatly enjoys sailing.

name: Ahmari
desc: A Khonsu tribe leader. A brave fighter.

name: Hakeem
desc: A Khonsu tribe leader. A shrewd thinker.

name: Kesley
desc: An Aurelian knight ordered by Esteban.

name: Chara
desc: A deranged mage fighting for Aurelia.

name: bigman?
desc: A wandering apothecary from Arborst with a strange name.

name: Argalan
desc: Father of Xeconis and an incredibly powerful magician.

name: Hecati
desc: Mother of Xeconis and an incredibly powerful magician.
